articles.title: National Meeting Marks May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill Thursday to mark the 124th May Day.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, O Su Yong and, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials and employees of the mill and labor innovators and working people in the city.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a report.
					
					 He said that May Day is a significant holiday fully demonstrating the revolutionary spirit and power of workers, farmers, intellectuals and other people of Songun Korea and boosting international solidarity with other working people in the world struggling for democratic freedom and rights and independent life by breaking the chains of capital.
					
					 As they were guided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the working people in the DPRK could successfully fulfill their noble historic mission and duty in the efforts to carry out the revolutionary cause of Juche and the socialist cause, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung made sure that May Day was significantly commemorated even in the arduous anti-Japanese struggle and took part in the first Pyongyang City mass rally marking May Day after the liberation of Korea and encouraged the working people in their efforts to build a new country.
					
					 The President visited the Kangson Steel Plant to meet its workers in the arduous postwar period and kindled the flame of the Chollima movement. He led the working people of the DPRK to perform miracles and feats in socialist construction in each period and stage of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Kim Jong Il rallied workers and other working people close around the Party with his politics of love, trust and benevolence and wisely led the popular masses' cause of independence and the socialist cause by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 He made sure that May Day was celebrated as international holiday for the working people in the whole world from the Juche-based viewpoint, making immortal contributions to the global cause of independence.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the drive for building a thriving nation by firmly believing in the workers, farmers and intellectuals of the DPRK and giving full play to their inexhaustible mental power.
					
					 His love is finding a vivid manifestation in the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Munsu Water Park, Masikryong Ski Resort, Mirim Riding Club, Unha Scientists Street, Okryu Children's Hospital, Ryugyong Dental Hospital, parks, pleasure grounds, vegetable greenhouses, mushroom production bases and other edifices for people's happiness successfully built in so short span of time in the Songun era.
					
					 Recorded in the annals of the Korean revolution are indomitable mental power and heroic feats of the workers and other people of the DPRK who have devoted themselves to the struggle for the country and revolution with hammers, sickles and writing brushes.
					
					 There are many countries and nations in the world but there are no such workers as those of Songun Korea who are displaying the independent dignity as human beings and leading a worthwhile life under the loving care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The reporter called on all working people to create a new Korean speed in all fields of the revolution and construction in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and through collective emulations, upholding the new line of the WPK on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: North, South Workers' Organizations Make Public Joint Resolution
articles.content:
North, South Workers' Organizations Make Public Joint Resolution
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the south Korean General Federation of Trade Unions and the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions released a joint resolution Thursday to mark the 124th May Day.
					 The resolution said that the workers in the north and the south have promoted national reconciliation and unity together with all other Koreans, sharing joy and sorrow with warm compatriotic feelings in the struggle for independent reunification in line with the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It expressed deep condolences for all the bereaved families of the victims of the ferry sinking accident that occurred in the south recently.
					
					 Workers' organizations in the north and the south expressed the following resolution, prompted by their will to defend the safety and peace of fellow countrymen and take the lead in paving a wide avenue for independent reunification:
					
					 1. The workers in the north and the south will promote national reconciliation and unity, get firmly united in solidarity and alliance under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 We will take the three principles of national reunification and the principle of national independence and the banner of By Our Nation Itself solemnly clarified in the north-south joint declarations as the lifeline of the reunification movement.
					
					 We will further consolidate solidarity and alliance among workers in the north and the south provided in the June 15 era, activate multi-faceted contact, visit and pro-reunification meeting and widen solidarity and cooperation between workers' organizations of industries, sectors and regions.
					
					 The workers in the north and the south will pool their efforts and wisdom for peace and reunification of the country, taking hands with all political parties, organizations and personages attaching importance to the nation and aspiring after reunification.
					
					 2. The workers in the north and the south will resolutely check war and confrontation moves and smear campaign of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 We will heighten vigilance and thoroughly smash all smear campaigns to malignantly slander and hurt the social system and dignity of the other party contrary to the spirit of the inter-Korean declarations and any move for confrontation of social systems.
					
					 We will, together with people from all walks of life at home and abroad valuing peace of the country and prospect of the nation, invigorate the anti-war peace movement against all reckless joint military exercises with foreign forces and arms buildup.
					
					 3. The workers in the north and the south will stand in the van of the patriotic efforts for preserving and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and open a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 They will put the reunification movement for supporting and implementing inter-Korean declarations on a normal and massive basis and expand it, urge their implementation and conduct diverse activities on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, in particular, thus turning the movement for implementing them into a nationwide movement.
					
					 They are the eldest son of the nation and standard-bearers and vanguard opening a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 They will take the lead in protecting the security of the nation and peace of the country and opening the June 15 era of independent reunification in solidarity and unity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself, deeply cherishing the noble mission and responsibility they are assuming before the times and the nation.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Celebrate May Day with Working People
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Celebrate May Day with Working People
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are significantly celebrating the 124th May Day.
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol and Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and officials of the party organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions and local party and power bodies went to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, State Academy of Sciences, Taean Heavy Machine Complex, Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province, Nampho Fishery Station and other institutions, enterprises, factories and farms to congratulate the workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals on the holiday.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before statues of President Kim Il Sung, portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting them.
					
					 Going round revolutionary museums, rooms dedicated to history, etc., they recollected with deep emotion the brilliant revolutionary life and undying leadership feats of the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Senior party and state officials encouraged labor innovators, talking with them.
					
					 They, together with working people, conducted colorful sports and amusement games including tug-of-war, Korean chess and yut-game and enjoyed art performances.
					
					 They requested all working people to fulfill their duty in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un in one mind.

articles.title: May Day Banquet for Workers Given
articles.content:
May Day Banquet for Workers Given
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A banquet for workers was given at the newly built workers' hostel of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill to mark May Day.
					 The banquet is a congratulatory banquet given by Kim Jong Un for the workers of the textile mill which is bringing about wind of leap in the forefront of the drive for improving people's living standard.
					
					 Invited to the banquet were labor innovators and workers, who are meeting their birthdays on the holiday, of the textile mill.
					
					 Present at the banquet were also commanding officers of the units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) who were mobilized in the construction of the hostel. 
					
					 Vice Marshal of the KPA Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA,  said in an address at the banquet that President Kim Il Sung built the textile mill on the bank of the River Taedong overgrown with weeds after the liberation of the country. 
					
					 The President let the textile mill was rehabilitated first in the postwar period and gave on-the-spot guidance dozens of times to turn the mill into the leading base of cloth production, Hwang said, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il took deep care of the workers to provide them with better living conditions saying that our society is world for the workers. In the last year of his precious life he visited the mill and personally met labor innovators to encourage them and gave the benevolent instructions to build well a hostel of workers. 
					
					 The deep love of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is steadily carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The workers' hostel of the textile mill is the palace of love, house of happiness and beloved cradle of workers built thanks to the Marshal. 
					
					 Hwang called upon the workers of the mill to work miracles and innovations in the production to reward the trust and expectation of the Marshal by producing more cloth.

articles.title: Working People of DPRK Celebrate May Day
articles.content:
Working People of DPRK Celebrate May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Working people across the country have significantly celebrated May Day.
					 Working people in Pyongyang spent the holiday with sports and amusement games, folk playing and art performances.
					
					 The workers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory demonstrated their unity through tug-of-war and other games.
					
					 Working people conducted sports and amusement games on Rungna Islet, Moran Hill, Taesongsan Pleasure Ground and other places.
					
					 The National Theatrical Troupe played the drama "Woman Comrade of Mt. Paektu" at the National Theatre.
					
					 Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe and the National Folk Art Troupe put on stages colorful numbers, delighting working people.
					
					 The National Circus gave acrobatic performances at the Mangyongdae Amusement Park and other places to be acclaimed by the spectators.
					
					 Working people in Phyongsong, Sinuiju, Hyesan, Kanggye, Hamhung, Sariwon and other places have spent a pleasant day.
					
					 Workers of the Chollima Steel Complex and the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex conducted sports games, adding to the atmosphere of the holiday.
					
					 Agricultural workers also marked May Day.
					
					 Farmers of the Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County danced peasant dances and conducted folk and amusement games.
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the Manufactory No. 111 of the State Academy of Sciences and other institutions are filled with enthusiasm to positively contribute to the prosperity of the country with scientific and technological successes.

articles.title: DPRK Workers Proud of Their Devoted Efforts for National Prosperity
articles.content:
DPRK Workers Proud of Their Devoted Efforts for National Prosperity
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The workers of the DPRK are significantly greeting the May Day.
					 In the DPRK the workers have always displayed great patriotic enthusiasm in the efforts for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Soon after the liberation of the country from the Japanese colonial rule, Korean workers successfully restored blast furnaces destroyed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953), they made a huge contribution to winning the brilliant victory in the war by supplying war materials in a do-or-die spirit.
					
					 After the war that ruined the whole country, they successfully produced water pumps, excavators, tractors and electric locomotives by their own efforts and kindled the flame of the great Chollima upswing by turning out 120,000 tons of rolled steel at the blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tons.
					
					 Thanks to their devoted efforts, the DPRK was able to turn itself into a socialist industrial nation in a brief period of 14 years.
					
					 In the 1970s and 1980s, they ushered in a heyday of construction in Pyongyang City.
					
					 In the 1990s, they, encouraged by the revolutionary soldier spirit, created the Kanggye Spirit to make enormous economic achievements, thus paving a way for building an economic giant.
					
					 It was none other than President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who set up the working class as the driving force of society and the working masses as the master of their destiny for the first time in history and showed boundless loving care for them.
					
					 Their loving care for the working class has been brilliantly carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. It serves as a driving power to make the workers perform fresh miracles and innovations in the economic construction and improvement of people's livelihood.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Denounced for Abusing Cultural Treasures for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Denounced for Abusing Cultural Treasures for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group let loose provocative remarks that the cultural treasures south Korea received from U.S. President Obama during his Seoul junket had been "looted by north Korea". 
					 Park failed to utter proper words to her master, though south Korea took back those treasures from the U.S. belatedly. Yet, she kowtowed to him repeatedly, expressing gratitude. 
					
					 A spokesman for the Guidance Bureau for the Preservation of National Heritages said in a statement on Thursday that the Park group's act of abusing national historical treasures for confrontation with fellow countrymen is unpardonable.
					
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The Park group was so hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen and sycophantic and traitorous acts that it malignantly hurled mud at compatriots, floating the story about "the north's plunder of treasures" despite the fact that even their U.S. master admitted that the treasures were taken away by the U.S. 
					
					 This is an intolerable insult and mockery of the inviolable national cultural treasures and an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK. 
					
					 The nine pieces of cultural treasures south Korea received from Obama recently including the "most valuable treasure of the emperor" and state seal and stamps dating back to the Korean Feudal Dynasty are just part of many cultural treasures looted by the U.S. imperialist aggressors. 
					
					 The U.S. was obliged to make an apology to the Korean nation for its brigandish and illegal plunder of cultural treasures and return all of them to it, though belatedly. 
					
					 However, Park Geun Hye let pro-U.S. stooges of Chongwadae shamelessly claim that "those treasures were looted by the north". This clearly proves what despicable and wicked servant of the U.S. she is. 
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should not pardon the Park group for selling off even the dignity and interests of the Korean nation, keen on confrontation with the DPRK to serve the U.S. and its American master making sport of them over cultural treasures but throw hordes of traitors into the dumping ground of the times and history.

articles.title: Greetings from Nepali President
articles.content:
Greetings from Nepali President
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Nepali President Ram Baran Yadav on April 29.
					 The message extended heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 It wished him good health, happiness and great success in his work and the people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message, Gifts from Personages of Russia, China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message, Gifts from Personages of Russia, China
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message and gifts from the chairman and vice-chairman of the Korean War Veterans Council of Russia and a gift from the general manager of an architectural decoration designing company of China on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 82nd anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The congratulatory message and gifts were conveyed by the chairman of the council and the general manager of the Chinese company on April 9 and 25 to the DPRK ambassador to Russia and an official concerned of the DPRK working in China.

articles.title: January 8 Fishery Station Goes Operational
articles.content:
January 8 Fishery Station Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The January 8 Fishery Station of the Korean People's Army went into operation after being successfully built on the East Coast of the DPRK.
					 The fishery station is a fruition of the noble love of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un for the rising generation and people as he has worked hard to supply more fishes to the children and people in the DPRK.
					
					 The soldier builders completed the huge project in a matter of a little over two months which would take several years at an ordinary pace. This is another miracle and a model of creation of speed of Korea which can be created only by the Korean People's Army possessed of indomitable fighting spirit and heroic fighting traits. 
					
					 The fishery station has not only modern harbor facilities but all necessary best conditions and environment for the production of fishes and living of fishermen.
					
					 It is aimed to supply fishes to baby homes, orphanages, orphans' primary and secondary schools and old folks' homes across the country.
					
					 A ceremony of its completion took place on Wednesday.
					
					 Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, in his address said that the station could be built as a model of fishery stations across the country and a splendid monumental structure in the era of the Workers' Party thanks to the energetic leadership provided by Kim Jong Un with his love and dedication to the people and the heroic struggle of service personnel intensely loyal to the Party.
					
					 He called upon officials and employees of the station to become death-defying corps which attains the fishing goal set by Kim Jong Un at any cost.
					
					 Then the participants looked round various places of the station.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Public Health Sector Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Public Health Sector Closes
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The 2nd sports contest of public health sector closed.
					 Players proved successful by giving full play to sports techniques they have cultivated in day-to-day training.
					
					 The Pyongyang Maternity Hospital place the first in total point.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, officials concerned, officials of the public health sector, players, youth and students.

articles.title: DPRK Players Return
articles.content:
DPRK Players Return
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK players returned home on Thursday after participating in the 2014 Asian Wrestling Championship held in Kazakhstan.

articles.title: Papers Mark May Day
articles.content:
Papers Mark May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Papers here Thursday editorially mark May Day.
					 The history of the Workers' Party of Korea is shining as the proud one in which workers, peasants and intellectuals of the DPRK have set examples in the era for building a rich and powerful country, fulfilling their mission as masters of the country carrying on the revolution and construction under the guidance of the great leaders, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il aroused workers, peasants and intellectuals and successfully the revolution and construction with the Juche-based viewpoint on the working masses.
					
					 Under the guidance of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu the working people in the DPRK have performed great feats which will shine long in the history of building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 The cause of building a rich and powerful country started in Mt. Paektu has entered the new century of Juche.
					
					 The present era steered by Marshal Kim Jong Un is one of sea changes and leap forward in advance of Songun Korea and one for the final victory in building a thriving nation.
					
					 It is the most important affair for the DPRK to build an economic power and improve people's living standard as it has already emerged full-fledged politico-ideological power and military power. It is none other than the working people of the DPRK who are carrying it out.
					
					 Optimistic is the future of the cause of building a thriving nation as the working people of the DPRK have turned out with a single mind to glorify the great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Minju Joson says that a thriving socialist country would surely be built on this land thanks to the dynamic struggle of the working people remaining faithful to the cause of the leader and the Party.

articles.title: Servility to US Will Bring Misfortune to Japan: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Servility to U.S. Will Bring Misfortune to Japan: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and Japan recently agreed to additionally deploy two Aegis destroyers in Japan till 2017. A vice department director of the Japanese Defense Ministry claimed that this is aimed to secure the capability for detecting round-the-clock north Korea's move for missile launching and intercepting it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is preposterous for the Japanese reactionaries to talk about "missile threat" from the DPRK, while making a groundless speculation that someone would turn Japanese islands into a sea of flames at once.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that Japan is taking issue with DPRK over its satellite launch as "missile launch" and becoming frantic in its moves to establish a missile shield in collusion with the U.S. under this pretext.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries replaced their military strategy of "exclusive defense" with preemptive attack and painted the missile shield development and deployment with "interception", but no one believe it and its aggressive nature can not be covered up.
					
					 Clear is the purpose of their talking about the "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 They seek to justify the establishment of an ambitious missile shield and find a pretext for invasion of the DPRK. At present they are trying to find an excuse for arms buildup by dancing to the tune of the U.S. confrontation racket against the DPRK and put spurs to the preparations for reinvasion under the active patronage of their American master.
					
					 However, Japan should know that the servility to the U.S. would bring disaster only to Japan running headlong into aggression and war.
					
					 Japan had better be prudent before making a mess of its destiny for its bad habit of having drawn water to its mill by taking issue with others with the help of big countries.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet foreign minister of south Korea, at a recent meeting hosted by the Asan Policy Institute, presumptuously urged the DPRK to take a well-timed turn from "the wrong path", saying that the international community "would not tolerate the north's nuclear ambition any longer". Talking about "the gravity of the 4th nuclear test" at the Committee of Foreign Affairs and Unification of the "National Assembly", he let loose a spate of ridiculous remarks that the international community would "take a measure painful to the north" if it makes a nuclear test.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary dismisses his remarks as nonsense of a guy without any proper judgment of the current trend, engrossed in extreme hostility and ambition for confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 What can not be overlooked is the dangerous move of the south Korean puppet group intentionally driving the situation into the worst phase, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Yun is so steeped with servility towards foreign forces that he has not yet known the way for a dignified and proud life.
					
					 It is natural that south Korea is subject to sycophancy and submission as such a guy is steering foreign affairs.
					
					 Traitor Yun is busying himself with cooperation with foreign forces against the DPRK, crying out for "the north's abandonment of nuclear weapons" every day. This only proves that the puppet group is upset by the independent faith of the DPRK and its toughest measures.
					
					 Yun's reckless remarks about the nuclear issue are nothing but grumbling of a poor stooge.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays Bare Cunning Move of Park Geun Hye to Bridge over Ruling Crisis
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays Bare Cunning Move of Park Geun Hye to Bridge Over Ruling Crisis
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group is behaving as if it gained a big "success" through Obama's junket. The "success" touted by it is that Obama raised his hand to the re-postponement of transfer of the right to command the wartime operation.
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary says: This shows that Park is not trying to improve inter-Korean relations but to ignite a war against the DPRK through the confrontation with it with the help of the U.S.
					
					 Frankly speaking, the whole of south Korea is turning into a mourners' house due to the ferry Sewol sinking accident.
					
					 People are enraged at Park, saying that the number of the victims increased as she did not take measures in time to rescue hundreds of missing persons.
					
					 Upset by the angry people, she is trying to direct elsewhere the attention at home and abroad and bridge over the worsening ruling crisis by taking issue with the DPRK and aggravating the situation together with Obama. But this clearly proves how craftily she is moving to bridge over the ruling crisis.
					
					 As shown by her during Obama's south Korea visit, there is nothing to be expected in the inter-Korean relations as long as she stays in Chongwadae.

articles.title: Minju Joson Raps at Japanese Right-wing Politicians' Visits to Yasukuni
articles.content:
Minju Joson Raps at Japanese Right-wing Politicians' Visits to Yasukuni
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Right-wing politicians of Japan visited the Yasukuni Shrine on the occasion of the shrine's spring festival.
					 146 lawmakers belonging to the Association of Dietmen for Visiting Yasukuni Shrine flocked to the shrine in the wake of the visits by Yoshitaka Shindo, minister of Internal Affairs, and Keiji Furuya, chairman of the National Public Safety Commission.
					
					 In this regard Minju Joson Thursday comments that nothing can justify their visits to the shrine. 
					
					 The dead in the shrine were war criminals who invaded Korea and other Asian countries and committed hair-raising atrocities against their people, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 However, Japanese right-wing politicians are longing for the past days when Japan occupied and dominated Asia.
					
					 What they seek is to call back the departed soul of militarism to bring earlier the second "golden period" when they will become the "leader of Asia".
					
					 But they should know that they are dreaming a pipedream. Militarism has already been denied by history and thrown into dustbin of the times with severe punishment.
					
					 The Asian people and the international community will never tolerate the Japanese reactionaries' moves to launch overseas aggression again.
					
					 Asia today is not what it used to be in the past and Japan's moves to revive militarism and reinvade other countries will bring a final ruin to it.

articles.title: S. Korean Figure Calls for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Figure Calls for Peace against War
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Dam, an artist of south Korea, in a lecture given in Tokyo on April 13 called for respecting human rights and achieving peace against war, according to Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Hong said that Japan and south Korea are twins in committing corruptions and concealing them by dint of state power and entrusting their destinies to the U.S.
					
					 Both Japan and south Korea are disqualified to say about sovereignty and democracy as they can not exercise their rights to diplomacy and military affairs without the permission of the U.S., he said, and went on:
					
					 Japan and south Korea is little different from a state of the United States.
					
					 All the wars and disputes in the world are ascribable to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to use Japan and south Korea for realizing its military strategy of the Pacific region.
					
					 Hong called upon all the artists in Asia to arouse the people's consciousness of human rights and peace against war through solidarity actions.

articles.title: Obama's Asia Junket Denounced by Pro-Peace Organizations
articles.content:
Obama's Asia Junket Denounced by Pro-Peace  Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Pro-peace organizations staged a demonstration in New York on April 25 to denounce the U.S. president's Asia junket, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 The participants in the demonstration released a statement.
					
					 The statement said that the U.S. is trying to strengthen the military and political domination over the Asia-Pacific region and alliance with its followers.
					
					 Peoples are turning out in the struggle against the U.S. in those countries where there are U.S. military bases, it said, and went on:
					
					 The Obama administration should close all military bases in the Asia-Pacific region and stop all joint military drills.
					
					 The participants were opposed to the strengthening of the U.S.- south Korea-Japan military alliance and the signing of the U.S.-led Trans-Pacific Partnership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Italy
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy on April 21. 
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), says that invincible might of the DPRK lies in defending and eternally glorifying the Juche-oriented state-building idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by World Public
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by World Public
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- World public is highly praising the greatness of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 The department head of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria said that Kim Jong Un is identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in looks, traits and leadership. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The world progressive people are praising Kim Jong Un for invariably glorifying the DPRK as an invincible socialist power, true to the cause of preceding leaders. 
					
					 World media are highly lauding Kim Jong Un as the most famous and greatest man in the world though it is not long ago that he started leading the DPRK. 
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works said that Kim Jong Un, youngest leader in the world, is thoroughly implementing the most excellent idea that he serves the people. 
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said that Marshal Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK so that all its policies can be implemented for the people, putting the interests of the people above all. 
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il said that warm love and ardent reverence of the Korean people for Kim Jong Un move the international community. 
					
					 The vice president of Jakarta National University of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Un is building the DPRK into a powerful state by pursuing the unique line and independent policies, adding that the future of the DPRK will be rosier.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Cuba, Tunisia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Cuba, Tunisia
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Cuba and a seminar and round-table talks in Tunisia in the period from April 10 to 19 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun). 
					 On display at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and photos showing the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said at the meeting:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who was born in a patriotic and revolutionary family and embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens, launched an arduous armed struggle and defeated the Japanese imperialists to liberate the country. 
					
					 He founded the DPRK, led to victory the Fatherland Liberation War against the aggression by the U.S. imperialists and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence. 
					
					 He laid solid foundations for Korea's reunification and made great contributions to accomplishing the global cause of independence. 
					
					 We will make positive efforts for Korea's reunification and further strengthen friendship and solidarity with the Korean people. 
					
					 Haifa Fersi, chairperson of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association, and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung would always live in the hearts of all people as he indicated the way to be followed by mankind by founding the great Juche idea and performed undying exploits for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence through his energetic leadership.

articles.title: KPA Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
KPA Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Indonesian and Nigerian newspapers carried articles to mark the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					 The Indonesian paper Suara Karya on April 22 said that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK led by the Songun brilliant commanders defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialism and have mercilessly smashed the repeated war moves of the U.S. imperialists after the Korean War and defended the security of the country and the gains of revolution. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, directed primary efforts to strengthening the military power with Songun politics late in the last century when the political and military offensive of the imperialist allied forces focused on the DPRK after the collapse of socialism in East European countries, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 The KPA, therefore, has turned into the elite army matchless in the idea and faith and the invincible armed forces capable of defeating any aggressors at one stroke. 
					
					 The ever-victorious history of the KPA making a long drive with the Songun revolution will be given a steady continuity. 
					
					 On the same day the Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer dealt with the leadership exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il associated with the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA and brilliant feats performed by the service personnel of the division during the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Meanwhile, an article introducing the proud course of victory and glory covered by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on the same day.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Finnish Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Finnish Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea was held in Helsinki on April 24.
					 On display at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing proud successes achieved by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the drive for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The meeting reviewed achievements and experience in the work for the study and dissemination of the Juche idea last year before discussing an action program for this year. It elected the new leadership of the national committee. 
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the national committee, said in his report that the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and enriched by Kim Jong Il is greatly encouraging the world progressive people. 
					
					 He praised the great vitality of the Juche idea, saying that he visited the DPRK recently and witnessed the fact that it is turning into a paradise of the people in which the Juche idea is applied under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Referring to the successes achieved by the national committee in the work for studying and disseminating the Juche idea, he stressed the need to conduct the work in close combination with the solidarity activities supporting the just cause of the Korean people. 
					
					 Juha Kieksy was reelected chairman of the national committee. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Censured by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Censured by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on April 22 in denunciation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Noting the U.S. administration has desperately worked to encircle and contain its rivals and steadily maintain its political and military edge by concentrating on the Asia-Pacific region, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. secretary of Defense announced that the U.S. would additionally deploy two Aegis destroyers in Japan until 2017, clamoring about "aggression" by the DPRK.
					
					 While staging ceaseless joint military drills for aggression on the Korean peninsula, the U.S. is scheming to brand the DPRK as a "bellicose" country by compelling the latter to strengthen its nuclear deterrence and take military countermeasures.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its justifiable deterrence for self-defence in every way to cope with the U.S. hostile policy of aggression against it.
					
					 The U.S. reckless moves will have a very negative impact on resuming the six-party talks and spark nuclear arms race in the whole Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to ponder over its hostile policy toward the DPRK and rescind it when there is still time for the former.

articles.title: DPRK Lauded by World Public
articles.content:
DPRK Lauded by World Public
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- World public admires and envies the Korean people leading a worthy life, blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article on its website, which said:
					
					 In the DPRK the working popular masses are leading an independent and creative life to their heart's content as masters of the state sovereignty and production means.
					
					 There exists in the DPRK neither exploitation and oppression of man by man nor such serious social problem as the rich getting richer and the poor poorer.
					
					 People are free from unemployment and women are also fully exercising their rights in the state and society. Such a reality can be seen only in the DPRK.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Finnish Communist League noted the appearance of the Korean people filled with optimism and joy can be neither made nor fabricated.
					
					 A Nepalese paper said:
					
					 On May Day, the working people in the DPRK spend a pleasant time with colorful events, not staging a strike or demonstration in demand of the right to existence as those in other countries do.
					
					 The secretary general of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo praised the DPRK as a paradise of the people as there is no tax and free education and free medical healthcare are available in the country.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud noted:
					
					 Love for people is a starting point of all thinking and activities of HE Kim Jong Un and the supreme principle and highest goal of the politics pursued by him.
					
					 Wherever he visits, he has photo sessions with ordinary working people and soldiers arm in arm and shoulder to shoulder without ceremony.
					
					 All the Korean people are filled with a single mind to remain loyal to his leadership, impressed by the loving care shown by him.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo vicepremier en RPDC
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo vicepremier en RPDC
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publico el dia 30 un decreto sobre el nombramiento de Kim Tok Hun como viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.

articles.title: CRPP acusa a autoridades surcoreanas de atentar contra RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP acusa a autoridades surcoreanas de atentar contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica la vispera la informacion No.1060 para condenar a las autoridades surcoreanas que acusaron la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en cuanto a las reliquias culturales del periodo de dinastia feudal de Joson retornadas  recientemente por Obama.
					Por la fuerte demanda de la poblacion surcoreana, el presidente norteamericano Obama, durante su reciente visita a Seul, devolvio 9 bienes culturales del tiempo de la dinastia feudal de Joson incluyendo el sello imperial, robados por las tropas agresoras yanquis durante la pasada guerra coreana, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Un oficial de la infanteria de marina norteamericana las robo en el palacio de Deogsu de Seul y las llevo a su pais escondiendolas en su media.
					
					Sin embargo, Chongwadae (casa azul) titere provoco sin razon contra la RPDC chismeando que esos bienes devueltos esta vez por Obama son "los saqueados por el Norte (de Corea)".
					
					Tal proceder es otra provocacion brutal siendo una vil conspiracion para encubrir los actos criminales de EE.UU. y denigrar a su connacional.
					
					Hasta el mandatario norteamericano reconoce que esos bienes habian sido robados, pero, solo Chongwadae divulga el rumor del "saqueo del Norte", lo cual testimonia que la banda de Park Geun-hye es connotada sirvienta a grandes potencias y maniaca de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Es muy natural que los habitantes surcoreanos levantan en alto la consigna de "dimision" de Park, hija del dictador de "Yusin" calificandola de "asesina" que imputo a otros la responsabilidad de haber quitado la vida de centenares de personas inclusive los ninos escolares sin pedir merecida disculpa y conspira con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Por sus archicrimenes, Park no podra evitar jamas la severa sentencia de la historia.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 124o aniversario de Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 124o aniversario de Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang el acto central por el 124o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, fiesta internacional de los trabajadores de todo el mundo.
					Estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, O Su Yong, el presidente del CC de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, Hyon Sang Ju, el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas, Ri Myong Gil, los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica arriba mencionada, innovadores laborales y otros trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El informante senalo que el primero de mayo es la fiesta significativa en que se exaltan el espiritu revolucionario y el poderio combativo de los trabajadores de la Corea del Songun y fortalece la solidaridad internacional con los trabajadores de todo el mundo en lucha por romper la cadena del capital y lograr la libertad y el derecho democraticos y la vida independiente, y continuo:
					
					Gracias al gran Lider y al gran Dirigente los trabajadores coreanos pudieron cumplir magnificamente con su mision y deber historicos en la lucha por realizar la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la socialista.
					
					En la ardua guerra antijaponesa el Presidente Kim Il Sung hizo conmemorar con significacion el primero de mayo y al participar en el primer  mitin de los pyongyaneses por el primero de mayo despues de liberada la patria (15 de agosto de 1945) llamo a los trabajadores a la lucha por la construccion de una nueva patria.
					
					En el tiempo tan dificil de posguerra encendio las llamas del movimiento de Chollima visitando a la clase obrera de Kangson y en la cada etapa de la revolucion y la construccion dirigio a los trabajadores coreanos a lograr los milagros y proezas en la construccion socialista.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il agrupo compactamente a los obreros y otras amplias masas trabajadoras en torno al partido con la politica de amor, confianza y benevolencia y oriento sabiamente a la victoria con el poderio de la unidad monolitica la causa independiente, la socialista de las masas populares.
					
					Hizo conmemorar con la concepcion autoctona el primero de mayo como fiesta internacional de los trabajadores de todo el mundo e hizo aporte inmortal a la realizacion de la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirige sabiamente en la delantera la lucha por construir un Estado prospero poniendo de pleno manifiesto la inagotable fuerza espiritual de los obreros, campesinos e intelectuales de Corea.
					
					Gracias a su amor y generosidad se construyeron en el corto tiempo las creaciones monumentales para la felicidad del pueblo, tales como el Area de Recreo del Pueblo de Rungna, el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu, el campo de esqui del monte Masik, el Club de Equitacion de Mirim, la Avenida de los Cientificos Unha, el Hospital de Pediatria Okryu, el Hospital de Estomatologia Ryugyong, los parques y areas de recreo, invernaderos de verduras y las bases de cultivo de hongos.
					
					En los anales de la revolucion coreana estan anotadas la indoblegable fuerza espiritual y las proezas heroicas de los trabajadores coreanos que lucharon abnegadamente por la patria y la revolucion con el martillo, la hoz y el pincel.
					
					Aunque existen en el mundo numerosos paises y naciones no hay los obreros como los coreanos quienes gozan de una digna vida exaltando el honor independiente del ser humano en los regazos de los grandes hombres.
					
					Todos los trabajadores coreanos deben tomar firmemente la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo del PTC y crear en todos los sectores de la revolucion y la construccion la nueva velocidad de Corea con el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y el fervor de  emulacion colectiva.

articles.title: Entidades de obreros de Norte y Sur publican resolucion conjunta
articles.content:
Entidades de obreros de Norte y Sur publican resolucion conjunta
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, la Federacion General de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos publicaron hoy la resolucion conjunta dedicada al 124o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, fiesta internacional de los trabajadores de todo el mundo.
					 El documento subraya que en el camino para realizar la reunificacion independiente del 15 de Junio, los obreros del Norte y el Sur de Corea han promovido la reconciliacion y la unidad compartiendo la alegria y tristeza con el ardiente amor hacia los compatriotas junto con todos los coreanos y prosigue:
					
					 Aprovechando esta oportunidad expresa profundo consuelo a todos los familiares de los difuntos y damnificados por el incidente de hundimiento del barco de pasajeros recien ocurrido en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Juntando la voluntad de defender la tranquilidad de la nacion y la paz y abrir el camino amplio para la reunificacion independiente las entidades de obreros del Norte y el Sur expresaron la siguiente resolucion:
					
					  Primero, los obreros del Norte y el Sur promoveran con dinamismo la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion solidarizandose con firmeza bajo la bandera de Entre nosotros, los connacionales.
					
					  Tomaran como linea de vida del movimiento por la reunificacion los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria y la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", principio de independencia nacional, aclarado solemnemente en la Declaracion Conjunta del Norte y el Sur.
					
					  Consolidaran mas la solidaridad y union entre los obreros intercoreanos preparadas en la epoca del 15 de Junio, activaran el contacto multilateral, el viaje y la union de reunificacion y ampliaran la solidaridad y cooperacion entre las entidades de obreros por las industrias, ramas y regiones.
					
					  Aunaran las fuerzas y los talentos por la paz y la reunificacion del pais tomando las manos con todos los partidos politicos, las entidades y las personalidades que anteponen la nacion y desean la reintegracion territorial.
					
					  Segundo, los obreros del Norte y el Sur frenaran rotundamente las maniobras de guerra y confrontacion y la campana de calumnia de las fuerzas antinacionales y anti-reunificacion internas y externas del pais.
					
					  Elevaran la vigilancia y frustraran cabalmente todas las difamaciones y calumnias tendentes a desacreditar gravemente y perjudicar el regimen y la dignidad de la contraparte, en contraste con el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del Norte y el Sur, y cualesquier tejemanejes de enfrentamiento con regimen.
					
					  Desarrollaran con mas vigor el movimiento anti-guerra por la paz contra los imprudentes ejercicios militares conjuntos que se libran bajo varios rotulos junto con las fuerzas foraneas y el aumento armamentista solidarizandose activamente con distintos estratos internos y externos del pais que aprecian la paz del pais y la perspectiva de la nacion.
					
					  Tercero, los obreros del Norte y el Sur abriran con energia una nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad poniendose a la cabeza de la reunificacion y el patriotismo para defender y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					  Normalizaran, popularizaran y ampliaran el movimiento por la reunificacion para apoyar y ejecutar dichas declaraciones y sobre todo, con motivo del 14o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y del 7o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, urgiran la ejecucion de ellas y desarrollaran con amplitud las variadas actividades, de manera que convertiran el movimiento por ejecucion de declaraciones en el pannacional.
					
					Los obreros del Norte y el Sur son hijos mayores de la nacion, abanderados y vanguardias que abren nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Teniendo presente la pesada mision y responsabilidad asumidas ante la epoca y la nacion, solidarizaran y se uniran bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", lograran la seguridad de la nacion y la paz del pais y abriran al frente la epoca de la reunificacion independiente del 15 de Junio.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena visita de politicos derechistas japoneses a Yasukuni
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena visita de politicos derechistas japoneses a Yasukuni
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ACNC) -- En Japon con motivo del festival primaveral de santuario se realizo una visita de los politicos derechistas al santuario Yasukuni.
					 Lo hicieron el ministro de Asuntos Generales, Yoshitaka Shindo, el presidente del Comite de Seguridad Publica Nacional, Keiji Furuya, y les siguieron 146 miembros del "Encuentro de parlamentarios para visitar juntos el santuario Yasukuni".
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual de hoy, senala que la presente visita no puede justificarse y prosigue:
					
					 Los enterrados en dicho santuario son los criminales que agredieron a Corea y otros paises asiaticos y perpetuaron la barbariedad  nefanda contra los pueblos.
					
					 Pero, los politicos derechistas de Japon anoran mucho aquella epoca cuando Japon invadio y domino a Asia.
					
					 Su intencion reside en acelerar el segundo "tiempo de oro" para  ocupar la posicion de caudillo de Asia resucitando otra vez la fantasma de militarismo como en aquel "tiempo de oro" en que dominaban Asia por el militarismo.
					
					 Pero ellos deben conocer que abrigan la ilusion vana.
					
					 El militarismo ya fue negado cabalmente por la historia, castigado severamente y abandonado en el basurero de la epoca.
					
					  Los pueblos asiaticos y la sociedad internacional no toleraran nunca las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses tendentes a convertir  su pais en un Estado militarista de agresion a ultramar.
					
					 Asia de hoy no es la de ayer y la rehabilitacion del militarismo y las maniobras de reagresion solo llevaran Japon a la bancarrota final.
